module: Module-level comment: The "soc_system_master_secure_p2b_adapter" serves as a real-time data-passing bridge, maintaining signal integrity and synchronization within system components. It directly mirrors input data and control signals to outputs aligning 'in_ready' with 'out_ready', and transferring 'in_valid', 'in_data', 'in_startofpacket', and 'in_endofpacket' directly to corresponding outputs. A static internal signal ('in_channel') is used for possible future functionality, echoed to 'out_channel'.
